thread.title: 17 Things That Will Make You Question How Americans Even Get By
thread.title_full: 17 Things That Will Make You Question How Americans Even Get By

author: Tahlia Pritchard
title: 17 Things That Will Make You Question How Americans Even Get By
text:
And they allegedly microwave water so it boils, idk guys, I have no words for this. ID: 10686953 2. I don’t know how many times we have to say this, but America, it’s time to move on from Farenheit. View this image › 
reddit.com ID: 10687006 3. Honestly, why are you like this?! View this image › 
loldaddy.com ID: 10687074 4. Why must you ignore the logic from every other country in order to just do your own damn thing? View this image › 
lucifersrightnut.tumblr.com ID: 10687097 5. Because to be perfectly honest, sometimes your way, makes NO DAMN SENSE. View this image › 
thedailylaughs.tumblr.com ID: 10687092 6. Like ignoring the ability to have a pin on your card and relying on the good old signature method seems a little odd tbh. View this image › 
instagram.com ID: 10687014 7. And so does your pure obsession with college-related sports. View this image › 
Twitter: @mmmegan ID: 10687017 8. How do you even get by with the gaps in your toilet doors being so freaking huge? Like I get people won’t look on purpose, but how many times has it accidentally happened?! View this image › 
Twitter: @FunnyPicsDepot ID: 10687203 9. Also, the fact that your toilet water comes up so… high… is just mildly uncomfortable. View this image › 
Instagram: toiletstraveler / Via instagram.com ID: 10687019 10. And the way some of y’all resolve problems doesn’t necessarily scream “mature”. View this image › 
hattiesburgamerican.com ID: 10687064 11. Then there’s the food. Like, who approved this? A gallon of sugary tea in a GIANT PLASTIC CONTAINER? The fuck? View this image › 
merlinsbearditsthedoctor.tumblr.com ID: 10687121 12. Don’t even get me started on this vomit-worthy idea. View this image › 
Instagram: @ 98.percent / Via instagram.com ID: 10687128 13. Honestly, I don’t want to be rude, but I fail to see logic in so much of what you do, America. View this image › 
Twitter: @JumboFraser ID: 10687448 14. Like this for example. America, this is when you start RUINING things. View this image › 
Twitter: @JumboFraser Put the sugar down guys, and no one will get hurt.
ID: 10687469 15. Why on earth do your pharmacies sell beer? Like, why don’t you just restrict it to a goddamn bottle shop? View this image › 
Flickr: leoprieto ID: 10687467 16. Are you guys actually OK? Really though? View this image › 
Twitter: @chandibates ID: 10687480 17. And I couldn’t end this post without bringing up your ludicrous policy of not including the tax price on things. View this image › 
Twitter: @rushay Honestly. How the fuck do you guys even get by?
ID: 10687475 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Tahlia Pritchard is a senior writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
